name: 7th GoGreen summit
content: Climate change has slowly become a major concern over the last 50-60 years. It has not only affected one but all the countries in some way or another. Some are experiencing severe drought like Zimbabwe, Africa while countries like Japan (eastern region including Kenya) are experiencing torrential rains for almost two full months. Such an imbalance in the weather has become a worry for all the environmentalists and conservation biologists. Environmental activists are currently focusing on all the possible measures which are economically feasible and do not harm the environment in any form. Some of the initiatives include the use of stainless straw, cloth bags, recycled fabrics, organic pads, soft plastic-like organic matter that dissolves in water,etc. Such matters would be a part of discussion at the conference. The keynote speakers will shed light on various other ways of conserving the natural resources and sustainable use of the same. Thus, the audiences are to benefit the most from the climate change conference 2020.
